import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navigation from './layout/Navigation'; import HomePage from './pages/HomePage'; import Service from './pages/Service'; import homeImg from './asset/home.png'; function App() { const [currentBackground, setCurrentBackground] = useState(`url(${homeImg})`); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const [popupMode, setPopupMode] = useState('signup'); // 'signup' or 'login' const openPopup = (mode = 'signup') => { setPopupMode(mode); setIsOpen(true); }; const closePopup = () => setIsOpen(false); const switchMode = (mode) => setPopupMode(mode); const handleCardClick = (bg) => { if (bg && bg !== 'none') setCurrentBackground(bg); }; return (
openPopup('login')} openSignup={() => openPopup('signup')}/> {/* POPUP */} {isOpen && (
e.stopPropagation()}> {popupMode === 'signup' ? (

Create Account

Join Culture Compass and start your journey

{ e.preventDefault(); // Handle signup logic here console.log('Sign up submitted'); }}>

Already have an account? { e.preventDefault(); switchMode('login'); }}>Sign In

) : (

Welcome Back

Sign in to continue your journey

{ e.preventDefault(); // Handle login logic here console.log('Login submitted'); }}>
Forgot password?

Don't have an account? { e.preventDefault(); switchMode('signup'); }}>Sign Up

)}
)} {/* ROUTES */} } /> } />
© 2025 Culture Compass
); } export default App;
